Package com.deco2800.game.entities.factories

Class CutsceneTriggerFactory

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.entities.factories.CutsceneTriggerFactory
public class CutsceneTriggerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Factory to create obstacle entities.

Each obstacle entity type should have a creation method that returns a corresponding entity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Entity createDialogueTrigger​(RandomDialogueSet dialogueSet, DialogueSet type, int numRepeats)
    Creates an entity that can trigger a cutscene to start.
    static Entity createDownMoveTrigger()
    Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move down
    static Entity createLeftMoveTrigger()
    Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move left
    static Entity createMovementEndTrigger()
    Creates an entity trigger that will allow the player ot start inputting controls again.
    static Entity createPrisonerCutscene​(RandomDialogueSet dialogueSet, DialogueSet type, int numRepeats)
    Creates an entity that can trigger a cutscene to start.
    static Entity createRightMoveTrigger()
    Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move right
    static Entity createUpMoveTrigger()
    Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move up

  • Method Details

    • createDialogueTrigger

      public static Entity createDialogueTrigger​(RandomDialogueSet dialogueSet, DialogueSet type, int numRepeats)
      Creates an entity that can trigger a cutscene to start.
      Parameters:
      dialogueSet - the dialogue set the entity will trigger
      type - the type of selection of dialogue
      Returns:
      entity that will create the trigger within the map

      Parameters:
      dialogueSet - the dialogue set the entity will trigger
      type - the type of selection of dialogue
      Returns:
      entity that will create the trigger within the map

    • createLeftMoveTrigger

      public static Entity createLeftMoveTrigger()
      Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move left
      Returns:
      an Entity that will force the player to move left when collided with

    • createRightMoveTrigger

      public static Entity createRightMoveTrigger()
      Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move right
      Returns:
      an Entity that will force the player to move right when collided with

    • createUpMoveTrigger

      public static Entity createUpMoveTrigger()
      Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move up
      Returns:
      an Entity that will force the player to move up when collided with

    • createDownMoveTrigger

      public static Entity createDownMoveTrigger()
      Creates an entity that can trigger the start of a movement cutscene that will force the player to move down
      Returns:
      an Entity that will force the player to move down when collided with

    • createMovementEndTrigger

      public static Entity createMovementEndTrigger()
      Creates an entity trigger that will allow the player ot start inputting controls again. This will be used to end a movement cutscene.
      Returns:
      an Entity that allows the player to start inputting directions when collided with
